title: Does DistroKid have hidden fees? - Quora

response.answer_text: Nope, zip zero zilch! I use them and love them. And yes, I am getting paid, They are legit. Musician created for Musicians. Here’s a Discount to give them a shot! DistroKid is the easiest way for musicians to get their music into iTunes, Spotify, Amazon, Google Play, and more Don’t forget to get a Publisher as well! Also, check out the site that sparked it all! Fandalism Get honest reviews from other musicians and find collaborators that are Local, or better yet, Global! Good Luck Simply Mary - Musician, Singer/Songwriter
Here is a good article on the topic - I was thinking about joining DistroKid but this post exposes the hypocrisy of your founder/company.
